root.name: .pop()

example.code: a = [1, 2, 3, 4] print(a) a.pop() # Removes the last element of the list. print(a) # Prints: [1, 2, 3] a.pop(1) # Remove the element at index 1 of the list. print(a) # Prints: [1, 3]

root.description: This method removes and returns an element of the list from the given index. If no index is given, the last element is removed and returned.
